title: User Registration with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully using valid phone number and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid phone number.
Input a valid password meeting security requirements.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the registration is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify that a session is created and persisted.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Ensure a user can log in successfully with correct phone number and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input a registered phone number and valid password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and the user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify session persistence across page reloads.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure login fails and appropriate error messages display when incorrect credentials are entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input a registered phone number with incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is rejected.
Verify an appropriate error message about incorrect credentials is displayed.

title: Dashboard Load and Real-Time Update
description: Validate that the dashboard loads all components correctly, displays financial summaries, and updates in real-time when data changes.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard.
Verify that financial summaries, upcoming bills, goal progress, and insights cards are displayed.
Add a new financial transaction or update an existing one in backend or UI.
Verify that dashboard components reflect the updated financial data in real-time without manual refresh.

title: Add Financial Transaction with Valid Data
description: Verify user can successfully add a financial transaction with valid category, amount, and date.

steps.description: Navigate to add new transaction form.
Input valid data: correct category, amount, description, and date.
Submit the form.
Verify the transaction is added and visible in the transactions list.
Verify dashboard updates accordingly.

title: Prevent Duplicate Financial Transactions
description: Ensure application prevents adding duplicate transactions with the same category, amount, and date.

steps.description: Add a transaction with specific category, amount, and date.
Attempt to add the exact same transaction again.
Verify the application prevents duplicate entry and displays an appropriate validation error.

title: Edit Financial Transaction and Validate Data
description: Verify user can edit existing financial transactions and input validations are enforced correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to existing transaction and open edit dialog.
Modify valid fields with valid data.
Submit the changes.
Verify transaction is updated successfully.
Attempt to input invalid amount or category.
Verify validation errors are shown preventing submit.

title: Delete Financial Transaction
description: Validate that user can delete financial transactions and dashboard updates accordingly.

steps.description: Select a financial transaction from the list.
Confirm deletion action.
Verify that the transaction is removed from the list.
Verify dashboard financial summaries update correctly after deletion.

title: Create and Track Financial Goal Successfully
description: Verify user can create a financial goal, edit it, mark as complete, and view progress statistics.

steps.description: Navigate to goal creation form.
Enter valid goal details such as target amount, deadline, and description.
Submit the goal creation form.
Verify goal appears in goal list with initial progress stats.
Update progress or mark goal as complete.
Verify progress stats update correctly and goal status changes to completed.

title: Create, Edit and Drag-and-Drop Calendar Events
description: Validate that calendar events can be created, edited, and reordered via drag-and-drop in all calendar views.

steps.description: Navigate to calendar in day, week, and month view.
Create new events with title, date/time, and reminders.
Verify events appear correctly in respective calendar views.
Edit event details and save.
Verify event details update correctly in all views.
Drag and drop events to new time slots or dates.
Verify events are repositioned correctly and changes are saved.

title: Notification Management - Mark Read/Unread and Deletion
description: Ensure users can view notifications, mark them as read/unread, and delete notifications without errors.

steps.description: Open notifications dropdown.
Mark a notification as read.
Verify notification status updates and visual indication changes.
Mark a notification as unread.
Verify notification returns to unread state visually and logically.
Delete one or more notifications.
Verify notifications are removed and no UI errors occur.

title: Support Ticket Submission and Tracking
description: Validate the entire support system including ticket submission, status updates, and FAQ access.

steps.description: Navigate to support ticket form.
Submit a new support ticket with valid details.
Verify ticket is created and listed in user's support ticket list.
Update the ticket status or reply to it.
Verify the ticket status or conversation updates correctly.
Access FAQ section.
Verify FAQs load correctly and are searchable.

title: User Profile Update and Avatar Upload
description: Verify user can update profile information, upload a new avatar, and save security settings successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile settings page.
Update user details such as name, email, or phone.
Verify updated information is saved and displayed correctly.
Upload a new avatar image.
Verify avatar uploads successfully and updates on profile.
Modify security settings such as password and enable multi-factor authentication if available.
Verify security settings are saved without exposing sensitive data.

title: Subscription Plan Upgrade and Downgrade with Stripe Integration
description: Ensure users can change subscription plans via Stripe, with real-time UI updates and backend data consistency enforced by triggers.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription management page.
Initiate upgrade to a higher subscription tier using Stripe checkout.
Verify subscription status updates in UI after successful checkout.
Validate backend database reflects subscription change and triggers have enforced consistency.
Initiate downgrade to a lower subscription tier using Stripe portal.
Verify downgrade is processed correctly with appropriate UI and backend updates.

title: PWA Offline Functionality and Sync
description: Verify the app works offline using PWA features, provides update prompts, and syncs data correctly once online.

steps.description: Access the application and enable PWA installation.
Go offline and continue to use core features like viewing dashboard, adding transactions, and editing tasks/goals.
Verify functionality remains available and consistent in offline mode.
Reconnect to internet.
Verify data syncing occurs correctly without data loss.
Verify user is prompted to update to newer versions if available.

title: Route Protection and Access Control
description: Ensure protected routes are inaccessible without authentication and sessions enforce access control.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected pages (dashboard, profile, subscription) without logging in.
Verify that user is redirected to login page.
Login with valid credentials.
Access protected pages.
Verify full access and that user session persists during navigation.
Logout and try accessing protected pages again.
Verify access is denied and redirect occurs.

title: Invalid Input Handling in Forms
description: Verify all forms (authentication, transactions, goals, events, support tickets) handle invalid inputs gracefully with user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to each form in the application.
Enter invalid data such as empty required fields, invalid email formats, negative amounts, or incorrect date ranges.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify submission is blocked and relevant error messages are shown for each invalid input.

title: Support Ticket Status Tracking and Update
description: Ensure that support tickets reflect accurate status updates and user can track progress.

steps.description: Create a new support ticket.
Admin or support agent updates the ticket status (open, in progress, resolved).
Verify that the ticket status updates in user's ticket list and details view.
User replies to a ticket.
Verify conversation updates display properly.
